917820.name: Fairtravel Battle CCG
917820.description:
Fairtravel Battle is a fast-paced collectible card game (CCG) with a unique resource system, back-and-forth battles, and game modes for all preferences.

Play with friends or by yourself, without the need to empty your wallet buying card packs or keeping up with a meta.

Unique resource system

In Fairtravel Battle, your resources are everything! In this essence-mana system, any card can be placed on the bottom of your deck to gain an essence of your choice among Fervor ( ), Life ( ), Aegis ( ), and Gloom ( ), leveling up your ability to play cards, while also granting you mana ( ), which lets you play those cards.

The best part? Any card allows you to pick any essence of your choice, so you don't have to lose the cards that matter the most to you! And there are no essence cards, instead every card is usable as a resource!

Got enough mana but need that perfect card? You can always redraw a card by returning a card to the bottom of your deck and drawing a new card instead.

Make your magic run wild with your own custom crafted decks and find cool new ways to make cards interact together.

Back-and-forth battles

Battles in Fairtravel Battle aren't going to be one-sided if you play your cards right. With plenty of ways to counter your opponent and with little interruptions, battles are fast and engaging, and with the Explore mechanic, which lets you find a card among the next 5 cards in your deck, you have many more chances to find the cards you need to beat your opponent.

Game Modes for everyone

Duel

Bring your own decks to battle your friends or bots with up to 3 other players, or team up together and face an even bigger challenge!

Explorer

Every turn you select among 5 new cards to add to your deck. You never know what you'll get!

Chaos Raid

Team up with two other champions to defeat the Chaos Keeper in this 3 vs 1 battle! Or Play as the Chaos Keeper and turn things around! Can you beat the champions?

Draft

Build a deck by picking cards among booster packs and win as many times as you can to earn fabulous loot!

Sealed

Open booster packs and find the perfect cards among them to build the perfect 40-card deck and beat the competition!

Online, Offline, LAN, it never stops!

Play each mode online, offline with bots, host your own local matches, or use steam lobbies. Fairtravel Battle isn't dependent on hosted servers so it will always be playable offline or online through self hosted lobbies or steam lobbies.

Make your own content

Create your own custom game modes with your own rules right within the game. Add your own new cards, cosmetics, and card sets through the mod system!

No Microtransactions for card packs

Nobody likes paying a lot of money to enjoy collectible card games or being left behind after taking a break! Fairtravel Battle features no microtransactions for card packs. Any future microtransactions will be exclusively new content DLC such as new expansions or premium cosmetics.
